Realtor Remarks: Call John Ryan for viewing and details on build potential 604-932-7670

Public Remarks: Architecturally inspired custom built Shaughnessy home situated on a perfect 66 X 14 1.53 RS-5 zoned lot. Located on of the nicest streets in Shaughnessy this sprawling 5000+ square foot home has ample space for the entire family. Unique wrap-around floor plan offers a well laid out main floor with large family room, open concept kitchen and family room. 4 bedrooms upstairs offer privacy and space as well as a rooftop terrace. Below is a one of kind completely private indoor/outdoor swimming pool with heated tiles and hot tub. Large recreation room and private ensuite bedroom is ideal for in-laws or a nanny quarters. 2 car detached garage, as well as 1 car attached garage allow for plenty of storage options.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements approximate, buyer to verify if important. Seller is a licensed realtor.

Public Remarks: Once the site of the Czech Consulate, this First Shaughnessy home emanates a feeling of world history with new century charm. A sweeping wrap around veranda and appointed staircase leads you to a one of a kind majestic stained glass entrance. This grand residence was completely restored, raised and a new concrete foundation was laid. The wiring, plumbing and safety aspects have all been updated in a million dollar renovation. Situated on a large corner lot which maximizes the privacy and sun exposure to the large inviting yard that has been carefully planned to provide colourful displays of flowers throughout the spring and summer months. An absolute pleasure to show.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approximate, buyer to verify if important. Note BONUS Commission. A pleasure to show. Further information available at www.1799cedar.com phone Brian Higgins at 778-896-8474 or Salina Lau at 604-657-1623 to schedule showings.

Public Remarks: With 2,737 Sq. Ft. of indoor living space and 838 Sq. Ft. of outdoor living space for a total of 3,575 Sq. Ft., this last available 01 Estate Series floorplan in the developer’s inventory is the must have Vancouver House home! This well-appointed Estate has the ambiance of an opulent home with an ensemble of three bedrooms all with expansive views, plus five-bathrooms including a five piece master ensuite with freestanding bathtub. Running across the entire façade is 140 linear feet of floor-to-ceiling windows opening onto over 800 square feet of outdoor living space. Stunning views are seen from three vistas; scenery of Granville Island , further to the west all of Point Grey and English Bay out to the Pacific Ocean, and eastwards to False Creek and Mount Baker. Are you on The V List?
Realtor Remarks: Completion expected for January 2019. Floor plan & Measurements to be verified by the buyer is important. Not an assignment, developer owned. Deposit Structure: 10% upon accepted offer and 10% in 6 months as per the Developers Contract of Purchase and Sale.

Public Remarks: For the first time in almost 40 years, this stunning view property offering roughly 130' view-side frontage, is being offered for sale. This is truly one of the most spectacular properties West Van has to offer. With breathtaking panoramic views stretching from Mount Baker, west over downtown, Howe Sound and beyond. The magnificent grounds offer tremendous privacy. This home has been lovingly updated and impeccably maintained over the years by it's sole owner. Offering 5 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, and over 6,600sf of living space. A south side pool and spa with amazing views, and a lovely tranquil backyard with sport court. Please do not walk the property without an appointment. First Showings at Agent's Open November 26th.
Realtor Remarks: Measurements are approximate, to be measured by Buyers if important. Agent related to the Seller. Visit www.rachaelmaclean.com for additional photos, floor plan and respective documents. Offers, if any, SUnDAY Nov 29 at 5pm. First showings November 26th.

Public Remarks: PANORAMIC VIEWS OF CITY, LIONS GATE, MOUNTAINS & WATER! Located in the prestigious Chartwell area, situated on an immaculately manicured lot of over 22,000sqft. This home boasts elegance. Enter through the wrought iron gates with gold accents into a leveled driveway with ample amount of parking & 3-car garage. The 6 bedroom, 9 bathroom home will take your breathe away with the picturesque views enjoyed from the oversized windows in almost every room. This immaculate home is a must see and is definitely a pleasure to show!
